name: Envoi BL Client
metaModel.name: StockMove
subject: Commande $StockMove.SaleOrder.SaleOrderSeq$ expédiée
content:
Bonjour,

Nous tenons à vous informer que votre commande $StockMove.saleOrder.saleOrderSeq$ a été expédiée.
Vous trouverez en pièce jointe le Bon de Livraison associé. Si des articles sont manquants, le reste de votre commande sera expédiée dans les prochains jours.

name: Réception BL Fournisseur
metaModel.name: StockMove
subject: Commande $StockMove.PurchaseOrder.PurchaseOrderSeq$ expédiée
content:
Bonjour,

Nous avons bien reçu notre commande $StockMove.purchaseOrder.purchaseOrderSeq$ (votre Référence $StockMove.purchaseOrder.externalReference$).
Toutefois, la commande reçu est incomplète comme vous pourrez le constater.
Merci de nous faire parvenir le complément de commande le plus rapidement possible.

name: Delivery Order
metaModel.name: StockMove
subject: Order $StockMove.SaleOrder.SaleOrderSeq$ shipped
content:
Good morning,

We are pleased to inform you that your order $StockMove.saleOrder.saleOrderSeq$ has been shipped.
Please find attached to this mail the delivery order associated. If goods are missing, the remaining goods will be shipped in the next coming days.

Best regards
Axelor Team

name: Goods Reception Slip
metaModel.name: StockMove
subject: Order $StockMove.PurchaseOrder.PurchaseOrderSeq$ received
content:
Good morning,

We confirm the reception of our order $StockMove.purchaseOrder.purchaseOrderSeq$ (your reference $StockMove.purchaseOrder.externalReference$).
However, as per the attached receipt slip, the order is incomplete.
Please let us know when you estimate to deliver the remaining goods.

Best regards
Axelor Team

name: StockRule
metaModel.name: StockRules
subject: Stock rule $StockRules.product.fullName$ not respected
content:
Hello,

We are seeing a shortage of stock for the product $StockRules.product.fullName$ in the $StockRules.stockLocation.name$ location.

Best Regards

name: Logistical form
metaModel.name: LogisticalForm
subject: New logistical form entered ($LogisticalForm.deliveryNumber$)
content:
Hello,

A new logistical form was entered.

Its delivery number is $LogisticalForm.deliveryNumber$ and the delivered customer is $LogisticalForm.deliverToCustomerPartner.fullName$.

Best regards
